name: get-posts-by-algolia
description: Cloud Function respons√°vel pelas buscas de posts pelo algolia

scripts.deploy-cloud-function: cd deploy && gcloud functions deploy searchPostsByAlgolia --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --entry-point searchPostsByAlgolia --region southamerica-east1 --allow-unauthenticated --env-vars-file ../.env.yaml

author: Wellington Souza
